SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.core.model.chat

Class MessagePrivate

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.core.model.chat.Message
it.polimi.ingsw.core.model.chat.MessagePrivate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MessagePrivate extends Message
This class represents a private message in the chat. It extends the Message class. It maintains the receiver of the private message.
